title: Please, stop beating around the bush with Graves!
body:
This is getting ridiculous, i just read riot is planning to nerf Graves stats yet again.

Please, stop beating around the bush, the reason Graves is overbearing in the jungle isn't his tankiness or burst, those are his identity traits. 
The reason is his un compared clearing, and the main reason is his knock back to monsters, it allows him to stay healthy and power farm and always be ahed, you want to nerf his jungling? Fine, remove it, remove the E stacking on monsters aswell.

But please, stop nerfing his lane roles, jungle Graves wont give a shit about MR removal, you know who will?
Botlane Graves who goes against mages and supports with actual Magic damage.

Im sick of having my main getting hit in damage, durability, and burst, just because Jungle Graves has this stupid ass unnecessary passive. (And the broken lethality which brought him back to the spotlight)

Thank you, ADC Graves main since season 3....
#MakeADCgravesgreatagain

replies.body:
Who plays Graves bot?

I barely see him Top or Mid either.

I do, and it works, just not against his counters.
And there's a very good reason you dont see him top and mid, his laning keeps getting nerfed while his jungling is uneffected every time.
I just don't feel like his Kit would succeed bot anymore.

It does, you just need a good synergy with your supp.
CC heavy supports like leona, sion and naut just make it so easy to burst down squishies, which is how you play him.
Farm safely, and when you see a good opportunity, go all in and burst the adc.
What kind of build do you typically run?

> [{quoted}](name=MrHaZeYo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0Jm4IpYJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-16T06:17:19.057+0000)
>
> Who plays Graves bot?
> 
> I barely see him Top or Mid either.

Graves jg is busted af, he can keep monsters back while dealing LOTS of damage to them, and to think I've seen people complain about Rammus and WW jg, but then Graves, they're like "meh, not op"
Give us old Graves back!
Stealth cry for a cigar
Thank you! So much this! Circlejerking always come up with nonsense stuff...

Yeah.  I wish he was tuned more for botlane anyway.  I've been trying to round out my adc pool and Graves is perfect for facing those hard engage lanes that would oneshot my other adc's.
The knockback never really made that much sense to me anyway.  It's just a random feature to make him look cooler, with little practical use outside of jungling.  If he wants to stay healthy, he should be building lifesteal.  He's a draintank anyway.
He has a shotgun. It was put there to capitalize on that.
He has a shotgun with a damn Cylinder but can only fire 2 shots at a time before reloading...Never understood that.

If being tanky and at the same time bursting you to death is his identity then i consider his identity is why he needs to get gutted bad, he doesn't deserve tank stats for free and burst damage at the same time, that just doesn't ever work

His stats arent free, thats like saying darius passive damage is "free".
He needs to stack his E while constantly being in your face for it to be impactfull, dont forget Graves is a marksmen, he is squishy, no matter how you try to twist it, if he wants to deal damage, he will be squishy.
But! He is also the close range marksman, so why would i trade safety of range for some burst if i wont be alive to use that burst? Thats why he is a big tankier, but never a "tank".
Graves was always like this, heck, his old passive game him constant 30 MR and armor just for attacking minions.
So no, i disagree with you, this are his identities, just like cait is both a lane bully and hyper carry, and twitch is both assassin and hyper carry, Graves is a bursty durable marksman.

he doesn't need to build a single armor Item to get 130+ Armor and with {{item:1412}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3812}} {{item:3053}}  you can't really ever burst him instead of Cait
If he can get 130 armor in a fight then you deserve to die because he was left alive long enough to use his E that many bleeding times.
If he managed to stack to 8 while fighting you, you should actually just uninstall.
Basically what I said lol

> [{quoted}](name=SynthetikzDoPe,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0Jm4IpYJ,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2017-03-16T18:05:07.634+0000)
>
> If being tanky and at the same time bursting you to death is his identity then i consider his identity is why he needs to get gutted bad, he doesn't deserve tank stats for free and burst damage at the same time, that just doesn't ever work

Tank stats for free and burst damage, but also a dash and is a ranged marksmen.
The icing is the vision denial+slow on his W

Graves - short range dash 
Vi - long range knockback dash 

Yea, Graves sure is a diver
Smh

> [{quoted}](name=JackMcSnipeyz,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0Jm4IpYJ,comment-id=000a00000000,timestamp=2017-03-16T21:23:08.939+0000)
>
> Graves - short range dash 
> Vi - long range knockback dash 
> 
> Yea, Graves sure is a diver
> Smh

Ok i'll take out the diver comparisons :-)
I thought there would be puns =(
Then you made a Graves mistake
He was close, but no cigar.
Agreed

His clearing isn't even that good anymore compared to season 6 where it was both faster and healthier. Graves is stupid because he can stack red smite with PD and be impossible to 1v1, not because of his clear.
But according to opgg graves doesn't even build PD that often anymore...

Its going to take a month or two of obnoxious Graves games before Riot removes his knock back on Red and Blue. That is the only reason he's so obnoxious. He clears with 100% health.

He will lose some base stats and Riot will hum and haw over him.

Yeah, I miss being able to bot lane a standard crit build Graves right after his rework. It was the only damn thing that could handle {{champion:122}} because they both got reworked at about the same time during the Juggernaut fiasco

Riot does that to every champ that deserves nerfs anyways.

Nothing new.
